Text: Youre InvitedCollaborative WebBased Training and IZIO through a Free Online Demo Training budgets are being cut Travel and facility costs are on the rise Your corporate management is looking to you to cut costs Its time to place your trainers and students in the one classroom that that keeps them on site on the job and online through Collaborative WebBased Training and IZIO by Convenecom Youve heard of IZIO and youve heard of Collaborative Webbased Training CWBT We welcome you to experience the technology that brings instructorled training online You are invited to participate in Experience IZIO Collaborative WebBased Training This complimentary course provides a brief overview of the eLearning universe and the features and functionality of IZIO Course completion takes about one hour spread out over five days so all youll have to do is participate for about minutes a day to experience CWBT for yourself Taught entirely online by seasoned eLearning professionals Experience IZIO is an engaging lesson featuring a creative technology option available in training delivery today To register visit us at wwwconvenecom and Experience IZIO See you online The IZIO Team Athena Kelly Powering Instructorled Classrooms Online Athena Kelly Executive Sales Marketing Administrator Convenecom Market Street th Floor Suite San Francisco CA Tel Fax
